name: Zombie Dungeon: Pixel Age
description:
Give battle to monsters in a scary dungeon – fight like a girl! Very brave girl.

You are left alone in a dark and scary dungeon. There are a lot of different monsters, who want to eat you, but you are very brave girl, and also you have weapon! Zombie Dungeon: Pixel Age – overcome your fears, become a zombie fighter and start your adventure!

Explore corridors of this dark dungeon. Prepare your sword – you’ll have to fight with skeletons and zombies. You can use a magic, if enemies will be too strong. You’ll be a powerful fairy, a strong magician, a ruthless zombie hunter!

Zombie Dungeon: Pixel Age GAME FEATURES:
- You can be a brave girl zombie fighter;
- You have a real sword, and you can also use a magic;
- Explore mysterious dungeon full of zombies, skeletons and other monsters;
- Amazing pixel graphics like in old school games.

Zombie Dungeon: Pixel Age – great guest for all the fans of fairy tales and fantastic fiction. Escape from horror dungeon maze!
